Cleanse the minimise debuffs ASAP, reduce Enkidu to between 40% and 50% HP, and then wait until Chicken/Missile are cast.
Enkidu will fire missile at a player, leaving fire underneath, but only during Gildamesh's chicken debuff attack.

Decaying Gourmand from The Lost City of Amdapor

Mechanoscribe from The Great Gubal Library (Hard)

84.name: Cold Fog
84.note:
Last boss. When the expanding circle and the dragon heads appear, keep one head alive to let the boss finish the cast.
It's annoying to fight, recconended to be prepped with Diamondback etc, or bring a real healer as needed.

85.name: Stotram
85.note: Early raidwide. Don't forget your duty actions.

86.name: Saintly Beam
86.note: Its when the spotlight follows and explodes. Anybody kidnapped by a ghost as the boss dies won't learn the spell, wait for them to come back.

87.name: Feculent Flood
87.get: Tokkapchi (Final Boss) from Saint Mocianne's Arboretum (Hard)
87.note:
Last boss, halfway through the fight. Casts it at the mud slime. Remember to dmg the mud slime to push it away from aoe's and onto platforms.
Can also get #75 Devour from first boss.
